resources.string:
2017.02.11 Alpha (v10) 
• Detail page: Download of Restaurant images and slideshow 
• Detail page: Restaurant descriptions and opening times can be expanded 
• Help page: Showing changelog at click on version 
• Hilfeseite: Inserted terms of usage 
• Fix: Detail page now working for Huawei P8 

2017.02.04 Alpha (v9) 
• Detail-Seite: GoogleMaps, HereMaps, DB Navigator und Co geöffnet werden 
• Detail-Seite: Die Webseite des Restaurants geöffnet werden 
• Improved auto recognition of incredients 
• Improved RAM usage 
• Support for Android build-in backups 
• Fix for detail page: Updating times after UI restart 
• Fix: detail page can be opened after rotation
